events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving their vehicle and a utility pole.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and damage description.
An agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim promptly to ensure efficient processing.
The customer received acknowledgment of the claim submission along with initial instructions for next steps.
The agent requested the customer to provide photos of the vehicle damage and the police report related to the collision.
The customer submitted the requested documents, including detailed images showing the extent of the vehicle’s damage.
The claim investigation commenced, involving a review of submitted documents and contacting the involved authorities.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of liability and assessment of the vehicle repair costs.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the repair estimates provided by the authorized garage.
The customer responded positively, accepting the proposed settlement amount and expressing satisfaction with the process.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance underwriter following acceptance of the settlement terms.
The payment covering the repair costs was issued to the customer promptly as per the approved claim resolution.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the customer’s vehicle repairs were completed satisfactorily.
